front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Amendment to IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Part 16: Air Interface for Fixed and Mobile Broadband Wireless Access Systems--Amendment for Physical and Medium Access Control Layers for Combined Fixed and Mobile Operation in Licensed Bands (Amendment and Corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.16-2004)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document provides enhancements to the MAC and PHY management entities of IEEE Standard 802.16-2004, as amended by P802.16e, to create standardized procedures and interfaces for the management of conformant 802.16 devices.
